author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Pinker On receipt of this kindly apply to Mr Richards for the A/S of Dubliners (31 December 1915) and also draw up without further delay the agreement with Miss Weaver for the publication of my novel. Whatever terms she proposes you are instructed by me to agree to unconditionally, subject to your commission. I also wish to know what you have done with the verses and my play and will ask you to reply to this letter by return of post, express. Sincerely yours James Joyce
